decks.notes: This Sultai Control deck focuses on leveraging powerful control tools and ramp spells to outvalue opponents. It aims to control the board with removal spells like Heartless Act and Extinction Event while generating card advantage with Mazemind Tome and Sea Gate Restoration. The deck utilizes Emergent Ultimatum to tutor for powerful threats like Kiora Bests the Sea God or Alrund's Epiphany. With Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion, the deck is able to generate additional value by blinking permanents like Omen of the Sea and Valki, God of Lies.

This Sultai Control deck focuses on generating value through various removal spells like Heartless Act and Shadows' Verdict, while also ramping into powerful late-game threats such as Vorinclex, Monstrous Raider and Alrund's Epiphany. The deck also utilizes cards like Emergent Ultimatum to search for key combo pieces and apply pressure on the opponent. With Yorion, Sky Nomad as the companion, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent with multiple permanents entering the battlefield, creating a strong board presence and maintaining control of the game until it can secure a victory.

This deck focuses on controlling the game with a variety of removal spells and disruptive enchantments. It utilizes Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion to provide additional value by blinking permanents. The goal is to disrupt the opponent's strategy, control the board with removal spells, and eventually overwhelm them with powerful enchantments and creatures. The deck also includes a variety of pathways and triomes to ensure consistent mana fixing. The strategy revolves around maintaining board control, out-valuing the opponent, and ultimately grinding out a win through attrition.

The main idea of this deck is to control the game and outvalue your opponent by utilizing synergies between powerful cards such as Emergent Ultimatum and Yorion, Sky Nomad. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Mystical Dispute and Heartless Act, while setting up for powerful late-game plays with cards like Alrund's Epiphany and Kiora Bests the Sea God. The mana base is designed to support the deck's three-color requirements and maximize consistency. Ultimately, the goal is to outlast the opponent and secure victory through sheer card advantage and powerful threats.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy through counter spells, removal, and mill effects while building up its own resources through card draw and graveyard recursion. The key strategy is to control the tempo of the game by constantly interacting with the opponent's spells and creatures while setting up win conditions through milling their library or attacking with evasive creatures. The deck aims to outvalue the opponent by maximizing card advantage and efficiency in its spells, ultimately grinding out a victory through attrition.

The deck focuses on using the Companion Jegantha, the Wellspring to gain an advantage in the aggro strategy. The deck includes a mix of strong creatures like Bonecrusher Giant and Lovestruck Beast, along with powerful support cards like Showdown of the Skalds and Felidar Retreat. By utilizing Jegantha as a Companion, the deck gains consistency and flexibility in its mana base, allowing for more aggressive plays and ensuring a strong board presence. The Naya color combination provides a diverse range of threats and answers, making the deck a formidable opponent in 1 vs 1 matchups.

The deck focuses on using powerful control spells and removal to disrupt the opponent's game plan while ramping up mana and card advantage through cards like Emergent Ultimatum and Alrund's Epiphany. The deck also utilizes the companion Yorion, Sky Nomad to provide additional value by flickering permanents like Omen of the Sea and Binding the Old Gods. With a mix of counterspells, removal, and powerful finishers like Kiora Bests the Sea God, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent in a long game.

The deck focuses on utilizing powerful control spells and removal to disrupt your opponent's game plan while ramping up mana and card advantage. The inclusion of Yorion as a companion allows for additional value through blinking permanents for extra triggers. The deck also features a strong toolbox of powerful cards like Emergent Ultimatum and Binding the Old Gods to create versatile and impactful plays, ultimately aiming to outvalue and outlast opponents in a long game.

The deck focuses on using efficient creatures like Jaspera Sentinel and Lovestruck Beast to build a board presence quickly. Edgewall Innkeeper helps you draw cards when you play creatures. Clarion Spirit provides extra value with its ability to make tokens. Giant Killer can deal with opposing threats, while Bonecrusher Giant provides removal and damage. Embercleave gives your creatures extra power and abilities. Showdown of the Skalds helps refill your hand and provides a big boost in power. Toski, Bearer of Secrets provides card draw and is difficult to deal with. Adventurous Impulse helps you find the cards you need.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive red creatures and spells. By utilizing cards like Phoenix of Ash, Torbran, and Embercleave, the goal is to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The inclusion of snow-covered lands and Frost Bite allows for additional removal options while also taking advantage of Faceless Haven. This deck aims to dominate the tempo of the game and win through fast and powerful attacks.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm opponents with aggressive red creatures and burn spells. By utilizing efficient creatures like Torbran, Anax, and Embercleave, along with damage-dealing spells like Frost Bite, the deck aims to quickly reduce the opponent's life total to zero. The inclusion of snow lands allows for additional synergy with cards like Faceless Haven, providing the deck with versatility and resilience against opposing strategies. The deck's strategy is focused on maintaining pressure and dealing damage quickly to secure victory.

The deck focuses on controlling the opponent's board and resources through a combination of removal spells, counterspells, card draw, and powerful finishers. The inclusion of Yorion as a companion allows for added value and flexibility with the ability to blink permanents for additional triggers. The deck also includes powerful creatures like Vorinclex and Valki, as well as versatile cards like Emergent Ultimatum and Shark Typhoon to help close out games. Overall, the strategy revolves around outlasting the opponent and establishing a dominant position on the battlefield.

The main focus of this deck is to control the board and outvalue the opponent through a combination of removal spells, card advantage engines, and powerful threats. The deck aims to stabilize the board with cards like Shadows' Verdict and Extinction Event, while generating card advantage with Alrund's Epiphany and Emergent Ultimatum. Additionally, the deck can use Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion to further increase its card advantage and flexibility. Overall, the deck's strategy revolves around controlling the game until it can overwhelm the opponent with its versatile threats and powerful plays.

The deck focuses on playing aggressively with creatures like Edgewall Innkeeper, Lovestruck Beast, and Bonecrusher Giant while also utilizing powerful spells like Goldspan Dragon and Brazen Borrower to control the board. The inclusion of Obosh, the Preypiercer as a companion enhances the damage output of the deck. The deck also features a few high-impact spells like The Great Henge and Genesis Ultimatum for added versatility. The mana base is designed to support the three colors of the Temur wedge in order to consistently cast spells and creatures on curve.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize the synergy between the creatures and spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. By focusing on efficient creatures like Bonecrusher Giant and Goldspan Dragon, while also generating card advantage with Edgewall Innkeeper and The Great Henge, the deck aims to maintain a relentless tempo. The inclusion of Obosh, the Preypiercer as a companion further boosts the damage output of the deck, providing additional pressure on the opponent. With a balanced mix of creatures and spells, the deck aims to dominate the battlefield and secure victory.

The deck focuses on playing low-cost efficient creatures and weapons to overwhelm the opponent quickly. It utilizes creatures like Usher of the Fallen and Luminarch Aspirant to quickly build up a board presence, while also having protection and removal options with Selfless Savior and Skyclave Apparition. The goal is to continuously apply pressure to the opponent, making it difficult for them to stabilize and establish their own game plan. The inclusion of powerful cards like Halvar, God of Battle and Legion Angel provide additional threats and resilience to the deck.
